articles.title: Ryder Cup 2023: Luke Donald named as Henrik Stenson's successor to captain Team Europe in Italy - Sky Sports
articles.description: Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.
articles.content:
Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.

articles.description: While Hayden Paddon was getting to grips with his new Hyundai i20 WRC2 rally car in Europe a couple of weeks back, David Thomson slipped behind its road-going equivalent on local roads...
